== Contact Us ==

Members of the Oklahoma LoCo can be found across many mediums. You can often times find us hanging out on IRC at #ubuntu-us-ok. You can Email the team through the mailing list or leave us a message on the Oklahoma LoCo Forum. Or if you just want more information try our Launchpad page.<<BR>>
* IRC: <nowiki>[[http://mibbit.com/chat/?server=irc.freenode.net&channel=%23ubuntu-us-ok|#ubuntu-us-ok]]</nowiki>
* Mailing list: https://lists.ubuntu.com/mailman/listinfo/ubuntu-us-ok
* Forum: https://oklahoma.ubuntuforums.org
* Our Launchpad team page: https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-oklahoma
